Merge pull request #1346 from garvankeeley/port-changes-from-fennec

Changed prefs to getInstance(Context) and the less-safe getInstanceWithoutContext()
one more patch against the gradle build so that the MOCK_LOCATION permission is properly added but only for debug build types
Added null checks before attempting to stop any of the gps, wifi or cell scanners.
consolidated the setZoom and setCenter method calls into one place
When we save the last known position to the preferences, we also now save it for use as the start of the next simulation.
Force disable the simulation mode if MOCK_LOCATION permissions are not available on the device.

Merge pull request #1390 from garvankeeley/telemetry

Telemetry: Added time between locations received (sync code from fennec)

added docs for testing with Android Studio using the new test framework.
Updated test.sh to use simplified command line.
disable pre-dexing as it's not useful and just slows down the build.

This fixes a long standing oddity that IHttpUtil was passed in as a
reference sometimes, and instantiated raw other times.

Now we just grab it from the ServiceLocator.

The UpdaterTest has been simplified to overload the mock networking
using the ServiceLocator.

Minor changes to ServiceConfig are included so that only strings are
needed to instantiate classes, so that the ServiceConfig class does
not need build time dependencies on any other class.

Merge pull request #1393 from JensErat/blocklist-additions

Blocklist additions for in-flight WiFi (@JensErat)
bumped to 1.5.5
incorrect error message on classload failure in ServiceConfig
updated proguard rules to not skip svclocator classes

catch RuntimeExceptions when the widget update fails.  These are
noncritical errors, but uncaught RTE will cause the app to crash.

Change visibility of remoteViews in MainDrawerActivity to be package default instead of private so that we can replace them with a  mock while under test.
Log now has a circular buffer of 10 strings that can be used to help diagnose Log messages while under test.
Added AppWidgetManagerProxy to the list of services injected to remove the AppWidgetManager singleton dependency.
Added test around catching RuntimeException when the AppWidgetManager throws an unexpected error.

Added support in the prefs UI for power saving options. UI only changes
in this commit
Handle the prefs changes in the ScanManager
